description:
A versastile long sleeve to keep little ones warm in cold weather. Merino wool feels cozy next to skin and helps keep little ones toasty when temperatures dip. The high polyester content moves moisture away to prevent chills.

  • Merino wool and polyester blend with a brushed back for warmth and softness next to the skin
  • Merino wool regulates temperature and is naturally antimicrobial
  • Flat seams don't chafe or add bulk, so they're good for layering
  • Hand-me-down ID label
name: MEC T2 Merino Base Layer Long Sleeve Top - Children
